title: Sausages with Puy lentils
ingredients: ['2 large onions, chopped', '4 garlic cloves, thinly sliced', '350g carrots, peeled and diced', '1 large fennel bulb, chopped', '2 bay leaves', '4 sprigs of fresh thyme', 'grated zest and juice of 1 orange', '1 tbsp olive oil', '6 good-quality, meaty pork sausages', '250g Puy lentils, rinsed', '300ml red wine', '4 tbsp redcurrant jelly', '1 tbsp Dijon mustard', 'TO GARNISH orange wedges']
